definitions.definition: A backward regression ; a reverting back to a worse state.
A dance move in which the feet are alternately slid back and the heels lifted, giving the illusion of walking forwards while actually moving backwards.

main_definition: A backward regression ; a reverting back to a worse state.
secondary_definitions: ( dance ) A dance move in which the feet are alternately slid back and the heels lifted, giving the illusion of walking forwards while actually moving backwards.
